data.message: Facebook... where is the place to report businesses that made false ad or false statement regarding their business. Are you not going to protect your users from bad businesses?

replies.message: Hey Madeline. If you come across a Page that violates the Facebook Terms, please report it. To submit a report, go to the Page you want to report and click the drop-down below the Page's cover. Then select Report Page and follow the on-screen directions to file a report. Thank you. -Elizabeth

Facebook i know this feature, but there's no option to report bait & switch or false advertisement. That means you allow it. I just wish you stop allowing that kind of advertisement to be featured, save your users from cheats! I guess I know now what ur priority is, sad really.
, Я так и не понял что эта за атака фейсбука без перевода с предложение написать коментарий незная о чем так страстно мне толкует фейсбук
